main event: At 6:17 AM on May 5, 1964, a witness observed a steady glowing light in the sky for about 1 hour and 30 minutes in Middletown, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright white light with a cone shape,The sighting took place at night under bright conditions,The object appeared to move in and out of sight behind a building,The witness reported no sound from the object,The sighting was confirmed by another individual associated with a local radio station.
witness description: A 33-year-old male engineer associated with Radio Station WPFB
